mapper.select: SELECT savings_performance.id, TO_CHAR(savings_performance.revenue_month, 'yyyy/MM') AS revenue_month, savings_performance.amount, savings_performance.savings_goal_amount FROM account.savings_performance WHERE savings_performance.user_id = #{userId.value}
SELECT SUM(savings_performance.amount) FROM account.savings_performance WHERE savings_performance.user_id = #{userId.value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account.savings_performance( user_id, revenue_month, amount, savings_goal_amount )VALUES( #{userId.value}, #{savingsPerformance.savingsPerformanceRevenueMonth.value}::date, #{savingsPerformance.savingsPerformanceAmount.value}::integer, #{savingsPerformance.savingsGoalAmount.value}::integer )
